titleStmt.title: The remains of the reverend and learned Mr. John Corbet, late of Chichester printed from his own manuscripts.
Selections. 1684
titleStmt.author: Corbet, John, 1620-1680.

notesStmt.note: A series of brief theological discourses.
McAlpin records a copy with "An account given of the principles", "The nonconformist's plea," & "A humble endeavor of some plain and brief explication" appended, perhaps as issued.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

With: An account given of the principles & practices of several nonconformists / written by Mr. John Corbet ... London : Printed for Tho. Parkhurst ..., 1682 -- The nonconformist's plea for lay-communion with the Church of England / by Mr. John Corbet ... London : Printed for Thomas Parkhurst ..., 1683.
